channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Le Wand Dive Review: A Waterproof Wand Vibrator
item.description: It’s heavy and loud, but this powerful wand vibrator will send shockwaves through you, even underwater.

item.title: The Structure of Ice in Space Is Neither Order nor Chaos—It’s Both
item.description: Long thought to be completely disordered, space ice appears to have some crystallized regions, new research suggests.

item.title: Study warns of ‘significant risks’ in using AI therapy chatbots
item.description: Therapy chatbots powered by large language models may stigmatize users with mental health conditions and otherwise respond inappropriately or even dan...

item.title: 9 Best Electric Scooters (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These WIRED-tested two-wheelers will help you scoot scoot scoot around town.

item.title: The countdown’s almost over: 2 days until TechCrunch All Stage 2025 kicks off in Boston
item.description: TechCrunch All Stage 2025 is almost here — In 2 days, the doors swing open at Boston’s SoWa Power Station. If you’re a founder or investor, this is yo...

item.title: Garmin Forerunner 970 Review: A Very Extra Running Watch
item.description: This is a very extra watch for very nerdy runners.

item.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX might invest $2 billion in Musk’s xAI
item.description: One Elon Musk business might be making a big investment in another.

item.title: UK launches £500M package to support diverse, underrepresented investors and founders

item.title: Meta acquires voice startup Play AI
item.description: Meta has acquired Play AI, a startup that uses AI to generate human-sounding voices.

item.title: LG Gram Pro 16 (2025) Review: Thin Is Still In
item.description: Thin is still in with this big update to LG’s impossibly light laptop line.
